creditline: Gift of Harriet and Walter Pratt
description: simplified image in blue, green, grey, and white with black outlines; figure in LRC with a blue jacket, green bag, and blue-green pants on a white road with curving lines; white house on hill in URQ, with two trees and two tall shrub-like elements; blue curving element at left with radiating black lines; green sky; received in silver foil frame
title: Country Road in Winter
